General.Name: Kuangda Technology Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Kuangda Technology Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of automobiles and vehicle interior fabrics, seat covers, and ecological synthetic leathers in China. The company offers woven, weft knitted, and warp knitted fabrics; chemical fibers; auto seat covers; and auto seat cushions, as well as warehousing and after-sales services. It is also involved in the investment, construction, and operation of solar photovoltaic power generation stations. The company was formerly known as Jiangsu Kuangda Automobile Textile Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Kuangda Technology Group Co., Ltd. in August 2015. Kuangda Technology Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Changzhou, China.
